topic.title: Discuss (U6): Oceans and Coastlines
topic.text:
Ocean levels are decreasing from the melting of glaciers and icecaps, the depth of water is changing as well as the overall salinity of the ocean.

  • Describe the human impacts that will be seen in coastal areas.
  • Describe the resulting changes that may occur in marine plant and animal life.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
